### Gapminder as tibble



## Summary of gapfinder table
```{r}

```

## Names within gapminder file 
```{r}

```
## Find the mean year within gapminder
```{r}
mean(gapminder$year)
```

## Find max and min in gapminder years
- max
```{r}
max(gapminder$year)
```
- min
```{r}
min(gapminder$year)
```
